metadata.job_title: Senior Data Engineer â€“ Commerce Data Pipelines

seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' with 3+ years experience requirement

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' with core focus on ETL pipelines, data modeling, and data quality frameworks

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on ETL pipelines, data modeling, orchestration tools (Airflow), and warehouse technologies (Snowflake/Redshift) indicates batch processing emphasis

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team management, or leadership responsibilities - pure individual contributor role focused on technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: Redshift mentioned as required skill (AWS-specific service), Snowflake also mentioned but Redshift indicates AWS as primary cloud

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only AWS services (Redshift) and cloud-agnostic services (Snowflake) mentioned, no other cloud providers

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL pipelines and Airflow orchestration typically handle batch processing; no streaming or real-time technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as required skill for ETL orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake and Redshift are both cloud data warehouse technologies, no data lake or lakehouse patterns mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid model requires 4 days onsite in specific US cities (Seattle, Santa Monica, NYC), indicating regional proximity requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: US-only locations mentioned (Seattle, Santa Monica, NYC) with no international timezone requirements specified

relocation_required.evidence: Must already be located in one of the three specified US cities to meet 4-day onsite requirement

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly states 'except OPT, CPT, H1B' in work authorization requirements

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Explicitly excludes OPT and CPT from acceptable work authorizations

citizenship_required.evidence: Accepts GC, USC, and valid EADs - requires work authorization but not citizenship

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Explicitly states 'W2 only' and 'no C2C or 1099 or sub-contract'

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No mention of IC track, management track, or any career progression paths

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills and no nice-to-haves listed, but requirements are reasonable for senior level

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description with specific data engineering responsibilities, not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3+ years experience for senior level and skill requirements are appropriate and realistic for data engineering role
